text: Su'aiba ne kiha he meri kauma! Daso jekara maim apane raba valom ika khul'hi nisani te ham para usa ne apane valom mainu cagi rozi vi diti hai, ate sai nahim' cahuda ki mai' khuda uha kama karam jisa tom' maim tuhanu roka riha ham. Maim tam sirafa sudhara cahuda ham jithom taka ho sake, mainu takata tam alaha tom hi milegi. Use upara maim bharosa kita hai ate use vala maim murada ham
